title: Gates Of The Arctic National Park & Preserve: Photos & Multimedia
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia             Photos & Multimedia       The Photos & Multimedia section provides a portal for virtual visitors to explore the Park's diverse natural wonders and human history through a variety of sights and sounds. To begin your journey of discovery into the Gates of the Arctic National Park and Preserve, take a look at our: Photo Gallery Our photo gallery will take you on a virtual expedition through the vast, expansive, natural beauty of the Brooks Range. Multimedia Presentations Experience this unique park through the eyes of a dog musher, artist in resident, archaeologists, and a photographer as they go on journeys of a lifetime through the rugged arctic wilderness. Watch one of our short videos to learn more about the distinctive flora, fauna, and people of past and present found in the Gates of the National Park and Preserve. Follow the Park's most up to date happenings and events on our Facebook and Twitter pages! A Work in Progress..... Keep checking back with us as we continue to add more awe-inspiring photos and informative videos to our Photos & Multimedia section.
